# Waru (2006 film)

|runtime        = 84 minutes
|country        = Japan
|language       = Japanese
|budget         =
}}
Waru (æ‚ª) is a 2006 Japanese crime action film directed by Takashi Miike. The sequel, Waru: kanketsu-hen, followed later in the year.
Cast

*Nagare Hagiwara as Luo
*Yoshihiko Hakamada as Genji
*Ryo Ishibashi as Sakuragi
*Hisao Maki
*Keiko Matsuzaka as Reiko Misugi
*Johnny Okura
*Hitoshi Ozawa
*Atsuko Sakuraba

*Kimika Yoshino
*Akira Maeda
*Satoru Sayama
